2103.subject: HCOM
2103.descrlong: Students survey ethical decision-making processes through the care, justice, and relational philosophical frameworks; they investigate, evaluate, and apply relational communication guidelines to the ethical dilemmas in interpersonal, small group, intercultural, and organizational situations. Offers built-in assessment in HCOM MLO 3 or the concentrations in Pre-Law or Practical and Professional Ethics. (Offered every other year.)
